subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Buffalo Bills receiver Roscoe Parrish was arrested early Saturday morning in Miami Beach, Fla., on a charge of driving under the influence, the police said. Parrish was stopped at 4:30 a.m. Saturday, the Miami Beach Police Department spokesman Juan Sanchez said. He was released later Saturday on $1,000 bond.
